Header Title

Header description text

Education Pro license request


Moovly provides highly discounted or even free licenses to teachers, students, schools, professors and other professionals working in the non-commercial education sector. Educational licenses are only available for true educational accounts: please make sure you are registered on Moovly with an email address from a .edu or other educational domain.

The educational Pro license (Edu Pro) has all features of the full Moovly Pro license and is available at 50% discount (yearly licenses only). To request your educational Pro license, please complete the form below:
